msg: Would recommend not using hardwood floor because it would be easily scratched. Can start working immediately.
name: Modern Bathroom 114 Sqft

msg: Change the table top material to marble, it would be a better fit for the room. Also the toilet should be made of ceramic, not cork.
name: New bedroom, generic-chic!

msg: The room seems good, I can start working on the 15th.
name: Technophobe Office

msg: Since its a washroom, you should use tile for the flooring and not hardwood. Other than that the room seems good and I can start work anytime.
Hi, I would like to work on your bathroom.  You made some good choices, I don't have any further recommendations.
name: Modern Bathroom 114 Sqft
